```java
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.AdvancedAntiDDos.ForwardRuleArgs;

import java.nio.file.Paths;

public class App {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Pulumi.run(App::stack);
    }

    public static void stack(Context ctx) {
        final var config = ctx.config();
        final var aadInstanceId = config.get("aadInstanceId");
        final var aadIpAddress = config.get("aadIpAddress");
        var test = new ForwardRule("test", ForwardRuleArgs.builder()        
            .instanceId(aadInstanceId)
            .ip(aadIpAddress)
            .forwardProtocol("udp")
            .forwardPort(808)
            .sourcePort(888)
            .sourceIpAddresses("1.1.1.1,2.2.2.2")
            .build());

    }
}
```

### Inputs

The ForwardRule resource accepts the following [input](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) properties:

            title="Required">

</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="forwardprotocol_csharp">

</span>

    </dt>

</dd><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the public IP addresss to which Advanced Anti-DDoS instance

            title="Required">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the forward port.
The valid value is range from <strong>1</strong> to <strong>65535</strong>.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_forward_protocol_python">

        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the ID of advanced Anti-DDoS instance.

            title="Optional">

## Import



Rule can be imported using the `id` (combination of `instance_id`, `ip`, `forward_protocol` and `forward_port`), separated by slashes (/), e.g.

```sh
 $ pulumi import huaweicloud:AdvancedAntiDDos/forwardRule:ForwardRule test &ltinstance_id&gt/&ltip&gt/&ltforward_protocol&gt/&ltforward_port&gt
```
